mcpOptions.name: Anime Search MCP
mcpOptions.description: This MCP server is configured to return anime titles based on a query.
mcpOptions.use: Perfect for applications that need to search and retrieve anime titles based on user input.

mcpOptions.name: LinkedIn Profile MCP
mcpOptions.description: This MCP server extracts and provides detailed information from LinkedIn profiles.
mcpOptions.use: Ideal for applications that need to retrieve and analyze professional profile data from LinkedIn.

mcpOptions.name: Movie Search MCP
mcpOptions.description: This MCP server helps search and retrieve movie information based on queries.
mcpOptions.use: Great for applications that need to find and display movie details and information.

mcpOptions.name: Series Content MCP
mcpOptions.description: This MCP server provides detailed information about TV series and shows.
mcpOptions.use: Perfect for applications that need to display or analyze TV series content and metadata.

mcpOptions.name: Hotel Estimate MCP
mcpOptions.description: This MCP server provides hotel pricing and estimation services.
mcpOptions.use: Ideal for travel applications that need to estimate and compare hotel prices.

mcpOptions.name: Cricket Search MCP
mcpOptions.description: This MCP server provides cricket-related information and statistics.
mcpOptions.use: Perfect for sports applications that need to access cricket match data and player statistics.

mcpOptions.name: Game Announcements MCP
mcpOptions.description: This MCP server provides updates and announcements about various games.
mcpOptions.use: Perfect for applications that need to track and display gaming news and announcements.

mcpOptions.name: Dev Quotes MCP
mcpOptions.description: This MCP server provides inspirational and educational quotes from developers.
mcpOptions.use: Great for applications that want to display programming-related quotes and wisdom.

mcpOptions.name: Horoscope MCP
mcpOptions.description: This MCP server provides daily horoscope readings and astrological information.
mcpOptions.use: Ideal for applications that need to display daily horoscopes and astrological content.

mcpOptions.name: YouTube Download MCP
mcpOptions.description: This MCP server enables YouTube video downloading functionality.
mcpOptions.use: Perfect for applications that need to provide YouTube video downloading capabilities.

mcpOptions.name: Instagram Viewer MCP
mcpOptions.description: This MCP server provides Instagram content viewing capabilities.
mcpOptions.use: Ideal for applications that need to display and interact with Instagram content.
